Package hw2

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    This class encapsulates all the logic for a multi-player game of "Wheel of Fortune".
    GameTextUI
    Text-based user interface for the WheelOfFortuneGame.
    HiddenText
    Class representing some hidden text for a letter-guessing game.
    PhraseList
    This class encapsulates a list of strings representing phrases or words for use in a letter-guessing game.
    Player
    This class encapsulates information about a player for a game in which money is won in multiple rounds.
    Wheel
    This class encapsulates information about the state of the wheel for a wheel of fortune game.
